Changelog
=========

.. currentmodule:: capuchin

Release 0.1b6
-------------

*Update* - Removed the key variable from the Application object, as it wasn't being used in this library. Added more usage documentation.

Release 0.1b5
-------------

*Update* - Removed global variables for expiration time and key_func. These are now passed into the `signed` decorator.

Release 0.1b4
-------------

Initial release
